title: SPD - Eine kriminelle Organisation? (2007)
description:
For english-only speaking:
This book is in german language. English title would be: SPD (Socialdemocratic party of Germany) - A criminal organisation? (2007). Corruption, fraud, stealing of votes, bribery, agent activity, murder orders, child murder... The criminal history of many socialdemocrats in Germany is truly incredible. In this unique book you'll see their dark past and how they continue to operate in politics. 85 pages.
